099495d6-642d-431d-9b7e-b327b4082945.message: Hi Jane, thanks for your prompt reply and for respecting Mark's privacy. The school requires a copy of the official diagnosis report or summary, any relevant mental health evaluations, any specific care recommendations or accommodations needed at school, and any emergency contact details relevant to Mark's health. Providing these details will help ensure Lucas receives the appropriate support and accommodations at school. Please let me know once you have shared this information so I can confirm receipt. Your cooperation is greatly appreciated.
